attributes.title: H&M clothing and merchandise manufacturing
attributes.description: This annotated map will guide you through the manufacturing process of an H&M product t-shirt. Hennes & Mauritz is a swedish retail clothing company known for their fast fashion, for men, women teenagers and children. H&M was found in Västerås, Sweden in 1947.

The H&M clothing labels and tags are printed in Stockholm, Sweden. Approved by the EU Ecolabel company. Those paper used are made from tree in forrest and rain forrest that are Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified.
attributes.title: H&M clothing and merchandise label and tag

attributes.description: The H&M products as t-shirts and sweaters are dyed into there selected color by the Yangtze rive in china, where they get there water supply as well.
attributes.title: Dyeing mill

attributes.description: H&M products are washed are cleaned from the water of the Brahmaputra River.
attributes.title: Water source of H&M products

attributes.description: The H&M products are made and manufactured and milled in Bangalore India.
attributes.title: Manufacturing of H&M clothing

attributes.description: The H&M products are made and manufactured in Bangladesh.
attributes.title: Manufacturing of H&M clothing

attributes.description: H&M's organic cotton is farmed and picked and certified in India
attributes.title: Import of Cotton

attributes.description: H&M's organic cotton is farmed and picked and certified in China
attributes.title: Import of Cotton

attributes.description: H&M's organic cotton is farmed and picked and certified in Turkey.
attributes.title: Import of Cotton

attributes.description: All of the clothes from H&M are designed and sampled in the headquarter in Stockholm, Sweden.
attributes.title: H&M headquaters
Manufacturing of H&M products
attributes.description: The H&M products are made and manufactured in Bandung, Indonesia.

attributes.title: Manufacturing of H&M products
attributes.description: The H&M products are made and manufactured in Bangkok, Thailand.

attributes.title: Distribution of H&M products
attributes.description: H&M's final products are sent off to Hamburg Germany  from there manufacture factories in Indonesia, Thailand, India and Bangladesh. From Hamburg, Germany the products are distributed to there designated store location.
